phrases: Even if those dreams will be scary
As long as I am looking at
The NOISE is kicking around the preestablished harmony.
Flaring up and glaring at the present.
That time at the GARAGE I saw a dream about unchangeable HEART.
So this day and the same tomorrow gets mixed.
I am roaring noisily around in sensibility.
My singing heart plays the BEAT.
Tears have been secretly she would.
Gets adjusted to the ordinary time.
I think that is the way it should be
At that time I was too afraid.
But now I am sending off my life.
We should only protect our beliefs.
I am drowning in the raging waves.
Still have not awaken from my dream.
I am looking for a way to shake off the solitude.
I have no other way but to move forward.
I believe in the way of life.
you She Would Tears in the Moonlight Shine?
Everyone, please have a look at the chart on page 108 of the textbook.
Although we briefly talked about this yesterday,
the study of souls, as shown in this chart, can be divided into several schools.
Let us continue to get along, Crona.
Why is everyone being so kind to someone like me?
She seems to be doing better, huh?
Yeah, one step at a time.
I am talking about this wound.
It are not cool clinging to the past.
If it is about a fight we lost, then I can get over it.
That is how it is, huh?
Maka's working really hard, you know?
Now's not the time to be fussing over minor details, right?
Alright, might as well play one game.
Pass it here for a second.
You have a high center of gravity, so lower your hips more,
and shoot with your shoulders relaxed.
Maybe we should have a party...
To Whom do you She Would Tears in the Moonlight Shine?
Soul, thanks for bringing your records.
I brought funk music because it is easier to get in the mood,
but it does not match the room's ambiance.
I have wanted to hear it ever since last time!
I am going to the washroom...
Anyway, he can play the piano?
When Soul became my partner, he played it for me once.
What kind of piece was it?
It was a really gloomy and weird piece...
He went, This is the kind of person I am.
But I thought that his anxiousness made him an interesting guy, so we soon became partners.
I missed the chance to hear him play, huh?
Tsubaki, get me some more, please.
You must feel uncomfortable with this noisy bunch, right?
A- Although I am still not used to it, I-I do not feel uncomfortable...
A-Although I am still not used to it, I-I do not feel uncomfortable...
A-Although I am still not used to it, I- I do not feel uncomfortable...
A-Although I am still not used to it, I-I do not feel uncomfortable...
No one's going to run away or anything, so you will fit in at your own pace.
There is no reason to rush.
Why are you all quiet over here?
This is a party, so let us have fun!
I am not teasing anyone, you know?
Crona, if anyone is teasing you, do not hold back and tell me!
I will kick his ass for you!
It is obvious, is not it?
We are all friends, after all.
If that is the case, get me some food!
I wonder if it will be to your liking.
Crona, next time, come hang out at our place.
If there is someone with an appetite like Ragnarok's, I will be glad to cook again!
Oi, Crona, you should get a partner that can cook delicious food, too!
You are my partner, Ragnarok, right?
The party was fun, was not it?
You are really simple-minded, are not you?
You could recognize me even though I look like this.
It is shameful, is not it?
You have become small just like I did, huh?
W-Why are you in Death City?
I came to see you, Crona.
Have you come to take me back?
No, you are to stay in Shibusen.
Please continue spying like you are now.
You do not have to be shy.
You infiltrated Shibusen to spy on them, did not you?
This is a task that only you can accomplish, Crona.
There is supposedly a secret vault somewhere in Shibusen.
For the time being, find that vault.
I am counting on you, Crona.
You will do it for your mother, will not you?
Death City is swirling with madness.
It seems that something will happen very soon...
Are you serious when you say that?
Do not make fun of the Pon Poko Dance!
Do you really listen to that?
I always lose when it comes to studying but, for some reason, I feel like I have won something this time.
I listen to it because I like it, so leave me be!
I am going back to the dorms...
She seems a little down lately.
She is always like that, is not she?
Get it over with and make up your mind already!
You are going to make Medusa angry.
Spirit-kun, since I am wearing a mask, Justin-kun cannot read my lips, can he?
Can you repeat what I say from now on, please?
Why do I have to do something so troublesome?
It is fine if he takes the earphones off, right?
Justin-kun, I called you here today to assign you to a new mission.
This is a divine message from Shinigami-sama.
Justin, you are here today to take on a new mission.
This is an important mission, you know...
You know that pursuing the Kishin is currently assigned to Azusa, because of her extended field of vision, right?
Right now, Azusa is pursuing Kishin, you know?
But is not there a limit to using eyes alone?
Therefore, I want you to join the pursuit, travel the world, and act as the legs.
You are also to join the pursuit, so there will be both eyes and legs.
Everything you say is a mouthful!
If you, Justin-kun, go around making a ruckus, you might be able to surprise that cowardly Kishin into jumping out of hiding.
If you, Justin-kun, go around making a ruckus, you might be able to surprise that cowardly Kishin into jumping out of hiding.
My, such a marvelous divine message!
I will gladly abide by it!
From here on, it seems to be an off-limits zone...
The secret vault might be in here.
If someone sees me in a place like this...
I will just tell them that I do not know anything.
We were returning to our room, but we got lost on the way...
The truth is, I am lost, too...
It kind of makes you want to do something about Shibusen's structure, does not it?
I will take you to your room.
It is all thanks to you that we took unnecessarily long!
If something troubles you again, do not worry about it and tell me.
I will lend you a hand... except if you ask for directions.
I will lend you a hand... except if you ask for directions.
The staff room is that way.
Jeez, I would rather not infiltrate this dangerous place all the time.
What is the location of the vault?
You must have a fair guess, right?
Does not matter if you tell me that...
Very well then, let us give you a different mission.
What is Professor Stein doing now?
I do not see Professor Stein much so I do not know, but...
Right now, Marie-sensei is his partner and they are living together.
What kind of person is she?
She is really nice and always concerned about me.
Then, shall we make use of that kindness?
Do you need me for something?
Want to come over to my place?
We will drink some tea, and talk about it slowly.
Inside that pen is a listening device.
Plant it inside Professor Stein's laboratory.
Honestly, this place only has research materials...
I had to bring those cups and everything else by myself.
Anything's fine as long as you can drink out of it.
But I can see that you have added a woman's touch here and there...
If I overdo it too much, Stein will get angry at me.
Is there something worrying you, Crona?
Oi, why is not there a share for me?
Ragnarok, you do not have a mouth, yet you can drink?
S-Sorry, I will go pour some for you.
S- Salt or pepper, put in whatever you want...
S-Salt or pepper, put in whatever you want...
Now then, shall we carry on with our conversation?
What did you want to ask me?
T-thank you, I f-feel much better.
I am happy that I was able to talk to you too, Crona.
Well, it is already late, so I will be going home.
How did you get that woman to swallow it?
It was a piece of cake!
We sneaked it into Marie's coffee.
That snake was imbued with a listening device using Medusa's magic.
This way, every time that woman is near Stein, his madness will increase.
Eh, what is it this time?
She is not used to school yet, so she is worried about a lot of things...
But she is a really good girl, and a cute one at that!
They are not suspicious at all, those idiots!
She will begin enjoying school soon.
Being able to meet Crona and the others makes me glad that I became a teacher at Shibusen!
It is already late, so I am going back to the dorms.
With this, Medusa will praise you for sure.
